Interfaces

Interface GriLounge

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeneralRepInformation

    public interface GriLounge
    Interface for Lounge for the use of the General Repository

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCustomersQueue()
      Adds a Customer to the queue
      void addCustomersReplacementQueue()
      Adds a Customer to the replacement car queue
      void finish()
      Terminates GeneralRepInformation server
      void removeCustomersQueue()
      Removes a Customer from the queue
      void removeCustomersReplacementQueue()
      Removes a Customer from the replacement car queue
      void setCustomerNeedsReplacement(int customer)
      Set if a Customer needs a replacement car.
      void setFlagMissingPart(int part, java.lang.String flag)
      Sets a flag signaling the Manager has been adviced that a specific part is missing
      void setNumCarWaitingPart(int part, int num)
      Sets the number of cars waiting for a specific part
      void setNumReplacementParked(int num)
      Set the number of replacement cars parked
      void setStateCustomer(int customer, int state)
      Set the state of a Customer
      void setStateManager(int state)
      Set the state of the Manager
      void setStateMechanic(int mechanic, int state)
      Set the state of a Mechanic

    • Method Detail

      • setStateManager

        void setStateManager(int state)
        Set the state of the Manager
        Parameters:
        state - the current state of the Manager

      • setStateCustomer

        void setStateCustomer(int customer,
                      int state)
        Set the state of a Customer
        Parameters:
        customer - the Customer that is going to change state
        state - the current state of specified Customer

      • setStateMechanic

        void setStateMechanic(int mechanic,
                      int state)
        Set the state of a Mechanic
        Parameters:
        mechanic - the Mechanic that is going to change state
        state - the current state of specified Mechanic

      • setCustomerNeedsReplacement

        void setCustomerNeedsReplacement(int customer)
        Set if a Customer needs a replacement car. Default value is "F", this sets it to "T"
        Parameters:
        customer - the Customer who needs a replacement car

      • addCustomersQueue

        void addCustomersQueue()
        Adds a Customer to the queue

      • removeCustomersQueue

        void removeCustomersQueue()
        Removes a Customer from the queue

      • addCustomersReplacementQueue

        void addCustomersReplacementQueue()
        Adds a Customer to the replacement car queue

      • removeCustomersReplacementQueue

        void removeCustomersReplacementQueue()
        Removes a Customer from the replacement car queue

      • setNumReplacementParked

        void setNumReplacementParked(int num)
        Set the number of replacement cars parked
        Parameters:
        num - the number of replacement cars parked

      • setNumCarWaitingPart

        void setNumCarWaitingPart(int part,
                          int num)
        Sets the number of cars waiting for a specific part
        Parameters:
        part - the part the cars are waiting for
        num - the number of cars waiting for the part. +1 if new car waiting for part, -1 if car no longer needs part

      • setFlagMissingPart

        void setFlagMissingPart(int part,
                        java.lang.String flag)
        Sets a flag signaling the Manager has been adviced that a specific part is missing
        Parameters:
        part - the part which needs to be set the flag
        flag - the flag signaling if Manager has been adviced (T/F)

      • finish

        void finish()
        Terminates GeneralRepInformation server
